title: New: CLAY – Follow Me Down
body:
**Clay’s** ambitious two-part [debut single](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/32807-introducing-clay) marked her out as a colossal talent, and her follow up, _Follow Me Down_, comes through on the early promise. More conventionally pop, there’s still a slightly off-kilter edge to it – which allows it to remain brim full of personality. Check it out below. Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.

More conventionally pop, there’s still a slightly off-kilter edge to it – which allows it to remain brim full of personality. Check it out below. Like this? Follow our On Repeat \[…\]
